description.title: Description
description.description: Human-readable description of the software packaged in the image

author.title: Author
author.description: Contact details of the people or organization responsible for the image (string)

version.description: Version of the image, it should be Semantic versioning-compatible

manifest_version.title: Manifest Version
manifest_version.description: The version of the manifest protocol

url.title: Url
url.description: URL to find more information on the image (string)

documentation.title: Documentation

vendor.title: Vendor
vendor.description: The name of the distributing entity, organization or individual (string)

license.description: License under which contained software is distributed

platform.title: Platform
platform.description: A list of CPU architectures that your image built on

keywords.title: keywords
keywords.description: A list of strings help user to filter and locate your package
